content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぽろりと――","translatedEnglishLine":"A drop falls――"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"滴がすずの頬を伝って落ちる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The droplet runs down Suzu's cheek and falls."},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早雲様がいないなんて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Soun-sama isn't here...?"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が……耐えられないんです……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I... can't bear it...!\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、お願いですから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, please...\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなこと……言わないで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't say things like that...\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ううううう……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuuuu...!\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すず」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suzu.\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すまない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君にここまで言わせてしまって」","translatedEnglishLine":"for making you say all this."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は……本当に情けないな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am... truly pathetic...\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早雲様は……情けなくなんて、ない、です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Soun-sama... isn't pathetic at all...\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……そうだね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... yes...\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう、あろうと思うよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's how it should be."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……もう二度と、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I swear, never again,"},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰にもこの心を操られたりはしないと誓う」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't let anyone control my heart anymore."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「女の子を泣かせたままとあっては、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To leave a girl crying like this,"},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"　北条家当主の前に男として失格になってしまう」","translatedEnglishLine":"is to be unqualified as a man before the head of the Hojo family."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すまなかった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"早雲がふわりと包み込むように","translatedEnglishLine":"Soun gently embraces"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"すずを抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzu in his arms."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当に、すまなかったね……すず……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Truly, I'm sorry... Suzu...\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわぁぁぁああ！　早雲様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaah! Soun-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これで……解決？　っすかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... is this... resolved?\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そうだね……きっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I think so... surely...\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふぅー、やれやれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew, what a relief...\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし女ってのは怖いねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But women sure are scary, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　なんのこっちゃ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What are you talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早雲には愛する恋人がいた、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Soun had a beloved lover,"},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　南条蘭って名前の女で……","translatedEnglishLine":"a woman named Nanjo Ran..."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあとある理由からそいつは死んだんだが」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, for some reason, she died,"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのすずって女、","translatedEnglishLine":"and that woman Suzu,"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その蘭の生まれ変わりだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the reincarnation of that Ran."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!?\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どっかで見たような気はしていたんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I felt like I'd seen her somewhere before.\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、執念だねぇー、やるねぇー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, that's some persistence, impressive."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死んで生まれ変わっても","translatedEnglishLine":"Even after dying and being reborn,"},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"　惚れた男の元にまた戻るたぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"she returns to the man she fell for.\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それって記憶は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What about her memories...?\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「多少は残ってるかもな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe some of them remain.\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、あくまでも多少だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, only to some extent.\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「完全には戻ってないだろうし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They probably haven't fully returned,"},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分と同一人物とは思えないだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"and she likely can't see herself as the same person.\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの女は他人である前世の女の影に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That woman is shadowed by the previous life's woman who is a stranger,"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"　男のそばにいる限りずっと苦しめられるわけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"and as long as she's by that man's side, she'll suffer forever.\""},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's... awful...\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まっ、心配はいらねぇーだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, there's no need to worry.\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう、ほっといても上手くいくだろうさ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It'll probably work out on its own now.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私に聞かれてもね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't ask me.\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、なんで、この面子の中で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, why is it that among this group,"},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一番恋愛に精通してそうなのが","translatedEnglishLine":"the one who seems most knowledgeable about love"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このホモなの……やだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is this homo... ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ、誰と誰がくっついたかなんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, who ends up with whom,"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どーーでもいいんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"doesn't matter at all.\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、＜エール＞。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, <Ale>.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滴がすずの頬を伝って落ちる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The droplet runs down Suzu's cheek and falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が……耐えられないんです……！」
君にここまで言わせてしまって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for making you say all this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早雲様は……情けなくなんて、ない、です……」
誰にもこの心を操られたりはしないと誓う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let anyone control my heart anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の子を泣かせたままとあっては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To leave a girl crying like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条家当主の前に男として失格になってしまう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is to be unqualified as a man before the head of the Hojo family.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲がふわりと包み込むように
「本当に、すまなかったね……すず……」
「うわぁぁぁああ！　早雲様！」
「しかし女ってのは怖いねぇ」
「早雲には愛する恋人がいた、
南条蘭って名前の女で……
まあとある理由からそいつは死んだんだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, for some reason, she died,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その蘭の生まれ変わりだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the reincarnation of that Ran.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっかで見たような気はしていたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I felt like I'd seen her somewhere before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、執念だねぇー、やるねぇー。
死んで生まれ変わっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after dying and being reborn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惚れた男の元にまた戻るたぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she returns to the man she fell for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全には戻ってないだろうし、
自分と同一人物とは思えないだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she likely can't see herself as the same person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの女は他人である前世の女の影に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That woman is shadowed by the previous life's woman who is a stranger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男のそばにいる限りずっと苦しめられるわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and as long as she's by that man's side, she'll suffer forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まっ、心配はいらねぇーだろ」
「もう、ほっといても上手くいくだろうさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It'll probably work out on its own now."
"Eh, why is it that among this group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一番恋愛に精通してそうなのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the one who seems most knowledgeable about love

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、誰と誰がくっついたかなんて、
どーーでもいいんだよ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滴がすずの頬を伝って落ちる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The droplet runs down Suzu's cheek and falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が……耐えられないんです……！」
君にここまで言わせてしまって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for making you say all this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早雲様は……情けなくなんて、ない、です……」
誰にもこの心を操られたりはしないと誓う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let anyone control my heart anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「女の子を泣かせたままとあっては、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To leave a girl crying like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条家当主の前に男として失格になってしまう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is to be unqualified as a man before the head of the Hojo family.

「本当に、すまなかったね……すず……」
「うわぁぁぁああ！　早雲様！」
「しかし女ってのは怖いねぇ」
「早雲には愛する恋人がいた、
南条蘭って名前の女で……
まあとある理由からそいつは死んだんだが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, for some reason, she died,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その蘭の生まれ変わりだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the reincarnation of that Ran.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どっかで見たような気はしていたんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I felt like I'd seen her somewhere before."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、執念だねぇー、やるねぇー。
死んで生まれ変わっても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after dying and being reborn,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 惚れた男の元にまた戻るたぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she returns to the man she fell for."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全には戻ってないだろうし、
自分と同一人物とは思えないだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and she likely can't see herself as the same person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの女は他人である前世の女の影に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That woman is shadowed by the previous life's woman who is a stranger,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男のそばにいる限りずっと苦しめられるわけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and as long as she's by that man's side, she'll suffer forever."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まっ、心配はいらねぇーだろ」
「もう、ほっといても上手くいくだろうさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It'll probably work out on its own now."
"Eh, why is it that among this group,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一番恋愛に精通してそうなのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the one who seems most knowledgeable about love

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、誰と誰がくっついたかなんて、
どーーでもいいんだよ」
